tips.title: Switch to 100% Renewable Energy
tips.description: Change to a provider offering certified green electricity from Dutch wind or solar sources.

tips.title: Install LED Lighting
tips.description: Replace all conventional lighting with LED alternatives throughout your office.

tips.title: Smart Building Controls
tips.description: Install motion sensors and smart thermostats to reduce energy waste.

tips.title: Solar Panel Installation
tips.description: Install solar panels on your office roof to generate your own renewable electricity.

tips.title: Building Insulation
tips.description: Improve wall, roof, and window insulation to reduce heat loss.

tips.title: Heat Pump Installation
tips.description: Replace fossil fuel heating systems with electric heat pumps.

tips.title: Switch to Biogas
tips.description: If heat pumps aren't viable, consider switching to certified biogas.

tips.title: Lower Thermostat Setting
tips.description: Reduce office temperature by 1-2Â°C during working hours.

tips.title: Electric Vehicle Fleet
tips.description: Replace company cars with electric vehicles charged with renewable energy.

tips.title: Remote Work Policy
tips.description: Implement a structured remote work policy to reduce commuting.

tips.title: Company Biking Program
tips.description: Provide company bikes or e-bikes for local trips and commuting.

tips.title: Green Commuting Incentives
tips.description: Offer financial incentives for employees using public transport.

tips.title: Virtual Meeting Policy
tips.description: Implement a policy requiring virtual alternatives before approving flights.

tips.title: Train Travel for Short Distances
tips.description: Mandate train travel for trips under 700km when possible.

tips.title: Combine Trips
tips.description: Plan multiple meetings in the same region for a single trip.

tips.title: High Quality Carbon Offsetting
tips.description: Invest in Gold Standard carbon offsets for unavoidable flights.
